column4: Can anyone recall the command that loads the gnome config editor? gnome-edit? gnome-config?
Can anyone help me to get suspend and/or hibernate working on my hp pavilion dv9235nr with Gutsy?
actually, a file in the recycle bin is still there until you empty it under ~/.Trash I think
It's probably going to be a graphics card issue...
Had same problem with my hp.
There is some parameter you need to change in the a config file for your graphics card so that your screen is not black when you come out of suspend or resume.
Did you manage to solve them?
It's not going into a suspend/resume at all
ahhh...  then that was not the problem I had..sry..
can't recall..however I remember it was the ati section in the X config file.
There was a line that you had to toggle from 0 to 1 or 1 to 0.
So that the unit would come out of hibernation or suspend properly
This should point you in the right direction. http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-181442.html
